title: Blondy's Dinosaur Discovery
backCoverBlurb: Blondy knows all the dinosaur names! She wants to meet a friendly T-Rex and Triceratops. Join her on an epic prehistoric adventure.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy smile. She is wearing a bright red t-shirt under blue denim overalls.

pages.text: Blondy was reading her big book about dinosaurs.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy with curly blonde hair and blue eyes reading a large book.

pages.text: Suddenly, her book started to glow and sparkle!
pages.imagePrompt: The book in Blondy's hands is emitting a bright, magical light.

pages.text: Blondy stepped inside and was in a forest of giant ferns.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy standing among huge green plants and tall trees.

pages.text: RAWR! A friendly T-Rex came to say hello to her.
pages.imagePrompt: A large, green but smiling T-Rex looking down at Blondy.

pages.text: Blondy wasn't scared. Hello, Mr. T-Rex! she said.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy waving her hand and smiling at the dinosaur.

pages.text: The T-Rex gave Blondy a ride on his big, strong back.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sitting on the back of the T-Rex, looking excited.

pages.text: They met a Triceratops named Toby near a blue lake.
pages.imagePrompt: A Triceratops with three horns standing by a clear lake.

pages.text: Toby shared some delicious green leaves with Blondy.
pages.imagePrompt: The Triceratops offering a bunch of leaves to Blondy.

pages.text: The land of dinosaurs was full of amazing sights.
pages.imagePrompt: Vibrant landscape with mountains and prehistoric creatures.

pages.text: It was time for Blondy to go back home to her room.
pages.imagePrompt: The magical light appearing again around Blondy.

pages.text: She waved goodbye to all her new dinosaur friends.
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy waving as she departs the prehistoric world.

pages.text: Blondy closed her book and smiled. What an adventure!
pages.imagePrompt: Blondy sitting in her room, holding the closed book.
